name: proc-that-rest-extractor
description: extractor for proc-that which loads results from REST apis.

scripts.pretest: npm install && typings install && npm run clean && tsc
scripts.build: rimraf build dist && tsc --outDir dist -d && trash dist/**/*.spec.js && trash dist/**/*.spec.js.map && trash dist/**/*.spec.d.ts
